summary: New armor set for female characters. for all body replacers.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i52.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/49/931ce6068590d4e1c71f12e1bea40549.png[/IMG][/URL]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requires latest path 1.8...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please attention. Latest mod news.

version 1.02: more stabilish work + optional meshes (without protect chain)

The mod adds a new armor for the female characters. There is a heavy and light version.
Armor completely closed, for all body replacer.
In order not to spoil the atmosphere of the game, the armor was made in vanilla color.
And of course, those who have seen my work before, know:As usual with a complete zero.
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i51.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/5e/cafb283ac5ef86d2669fc11cbb258f5e.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
how to play/where to find:
You\'ll find it near the Vaytran. Where there are signs of roads, in the chest under the bridge.
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i51.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/85/2d4fe562912a662b3372b7e6f6f33285.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i52.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/2f/97478a621c6095f66aa987579556952f.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i54.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/2c/abcbcec72c11c4ceb710907584fa2d2c.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
video by mattyb89
[youtube]iGaRCD6vy_A[/youtube]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
installation (standart)
1. Use the Nexus mod manadger to download and install the entire package.
2. open the archive and copy the folder \"date\" in the game folder \"Skyrim\"
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i52.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/88/b6476c838d4090440ad5fd7f19301888.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
thanks:
Bethezda Softworks for TES 5
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i54.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0219/a5/cf1822fcadd26e0f06e15e5bcbc473a5.png[/IMG][/URL]

not hesitate to ask if you have any questions. It is possible in a personal letter, you can in the comments.

Sorry for my bad English.
author: Severus616
